meanings.definition: The quality or state of being transparent.
meanings.sent1: The transparentnesses of the glass allowed us to see through it easily.
meanings.sent2: The clear plastic bag's transparentnesses made it easy to find my keys.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick relied on the transparentnesses of the glass box to fool the audience.
meanings.sent4: Her honesty had a transparentnesses that made it impossible to doubt her sincerity.
meanings.sent5: The transparentnesses of the water was so pure that you could see every pebble at the bottom.

meanings.definition: The property of allowing light to pass through so that objects behind can be distinctly seen.
meanings.sent1: The window's transparentnesses brightened up the room with natural light.
meanings.sent2: The transparency of the plastic wrap allowed us to see the sandwich inside.
meanings.sent3: The ghost's transparentnesses made it difficult for anyone to take it seriously.
meanings.sent4: The artist used the transparentnesses of the fabric to create a delicate and airy dress.
meanings.sent5: The transparentnesses of the glass sculpture created a stunning play of light and shadow.
